title: Hi on my Pixel 3a all my sensors have stopped working.I am on Android 10 and July security patch.
content:
As all my sensors are unresponsive
Gyro, proximity,active edge etc.
I tried to factory reset the pixel 3a but no luck as nk sensors were still working.
I even opted in for Android Beta 11 program and even that did not help,now I have rolled back.
Please advice how to make the phone usable again.
